name: Apple Watch Series 4
description: The Apple Watch Series 4 is a technological masterpiece.To begin with, this smartphone comes with the high-end S4 64-bit Dual-Core processor
features: Up to 24 hours of battery life

cards.name: Design
cards.description: The back of Apple Watch Series 4 is composed of a gorgeous black ceramic.

cards.name: Health
cards.description: Apple Watch Series 4 enables customers to take an ECG reading right from the wrist using the new ECG app.

cards.name: Staying Connected
cards.description: Customers can reach their friends with just a tap of the wrist with Walkie-Talkie.

cards.name: Safety
cards.description: With watchOS 5, Apple Watch intermittently analyzes heart rhythms in the background and sends a notification if an irregular heart rhythm.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 Pro
description: Samsung Galaxy Watch5 Pro is the premium smart watch built for your lifestyle. Get the insights you need to crush your wellness goals. Choose styles to match your day with customized watch faces and bands.

name: Google Pixel Watch
description: he Google Pixel Watch makes it easy to get help at a glance, right on your wrist. Live healthier with sleep, heart rate, and activity tracking on Fitbit, and get things done on the go with your favorite Google apps.
features: Help from Google, right on your wrist.

name: Garmin Venu 2 Plus
description: Get the fast, reliable power you need to make things run smoothly. Download your work. Stream your favorite show. Multitask at a moment’s notice. Do it all with minimal lag time, thanks to a dedicated graphics card and the latest 11th Generation Intel® CoreTM i5 and i7 processors.
